      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sentence
      A sentence which can contain terms.
      class  Term
      Represents text marked with some meaning.
      Methods in eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext with parameters of type Span 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String SemText.getText(Span span)
      Returns the text corresponding to of a given span.
      static boolean SemTexts.spanEqual(Span span1, Span span2)
      Returns whether the two provided spans have equal boundaries.
      static com.google.common.collect.Range SemTexts.spanToRange(Span span)
      Converts provided span to a Guava Range of the [start, end) form.
      Method parameters in eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext with type arguments of type Span 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SemTexts.checkSpans(Iterable<? extends Span> spans, int leftOffset, int rightOffset, Object prependedErrorMessage)
      Checks spans are all be valid spans (see SemTexts.checkSpan(int, int, Object) and are non-overlapping (a span end offset may coincide with next span start offset).
